data.comment: The first-half is now underway.
The ref points to the spot, it's a penalty for Reading.
In the minute 4, Asmir Begovic (Bournemouth) gets a yellow card.
Goal! Lucas Joao gives Reading a 0-1 lead from the penalty spot.
Goal! Reading extend their lead to 0-2 through Sone Aluko.
In the minute 43, Great play from Ovie Ejaria to set up the goal.
The first-half has ended.
The second-half has started.
In the minute 46, Chris Mepham is replacing Diego Rico Salguero for Bournemouth at Vitality Stadium.
Andy Rinomhota is booked for the away team.
Goal! Dominic Solanke pulls one back to make it 1-2.
In the minute 56, That's a fine assist from Lloyd Kelly.
Goal! The home team draw level at 2-2 through Arnaut Danjuma.
David Brooks instrumental with a fine assist.
In the minute 64, The away team have replaced Tomas Esteves with Tom Holmes. This is the first substitution made today by Veljko Paunovic.
Veljko Paunovic is making the team's second substitution at Vitality Stadium with Michael Olise replacing Sone Aluko.
Arnaut Danjuma (Bournemouth) has received a first yellow card.
In the minute 74, Reading make their third substitution with Yakou Meite replacing Ovie Ejaria.
Lewis Cook puts the ball in the net and the home team now lead 3-2.
David Brooks with an assist there.
In the minute 79, Rodrigo Riquelme is on a sub for Junior Stanislas for Bournemouth.
Jefferson Lerma for Bournemouth has been booked by Darren Bond and receives a first yellow card.
Veljko Paunovic (Reading) is making a fourth substitution, with Sam Baldock replacing Alfa Semedo.
In the minute 83, Jason Tindall (Bournemouth) is making a third substitution, with Jack Simpson replacing David Brooks.
Goal! Bournemouth extend their lead to 4-2 through Dominic Solanke.
The whistle has gone to end the second half. The match finishes 4-2.
The home team replace Jefferson Lerma with Nnamdi Ofoborh.
